name: Four Winds Fantasy DX Championship Edition
name_original: Four Winds Fantasy DX Championship Edition
description:
Taken from Hardcore Gaming 101's article on the game:

Released for the first time in October 2011 on the Xbox Live service under the Indie category, Four Winds Fantasy is a very peculiar yet rich gaming experience. It's hard to tell if it's a genuine masterpiece or a mediocre failure, but it's worth giving a shot, especially considering the mere 80 Microsoft Points it'll cost you. A DX version was released a few months later for the iOS, and so was a so-called DX Championship Edition in early 2012 for the PC. They both feature additional content, like extra characters facesets and achievements.

This is the PC port of Four Winds Fantasy, which was available temporarily on an official site as a pay-what-you-want release that isn't available anymore. It's mostly the same as the iOS and the original Xbox 360 versions.
